Articles.Content:
I've not opened the game in a couple of weeks and wanted to try out 1.8, but when opening KSP via steam it opens windowed and sticks on the DialogPlain.fnt page. Then a small error box pops up that says Unity 2019.2........ as the window title with a kerbal image with an "!" next to them. No crash logs are generated.

- No Mods

- Fresh Install

- Specs:

  • Ryzen 7 3700X
  • RX 5700XT
  • 16GB Trident Z RGB 3000 RAM
  • Asus Strix X570E
  • WD SN750 500GB NVMe drive

I've been able to open KSP flawlessly before but not sure if it's the new update or if it is something to do my my PC

 

Any help would be really appreciated

 

 

Edited October 20, 2019 by chlbutterworth
